I have the following two cards available for sale:

1) T205 Cobb PSA 1 w/Honest Long Cut back SOLD

2) T206 Shag Shaughnessy PSA 4 w/Old Mill back SOLD

Prices include first class shipping w/insurance.

Payments accepted: MO or Check preferred, but will also take Paypal.

First to email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url] with intent to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking.
Bump for price drop.  Thanks for looking
